title: Microsoft delivers on Win 10 Skype messaging promises
text:
Microsoft delivers on Win 10 Skype messaging promises 
Published By: Computerworld.com - Today 
Microsoft promised a lot of things in the run-up to the launch of Windows 10 and delivered many of them (especially for consumers) in time f...
